name: Vegan ‘Tuna’ Salad
description:
For Full Recipe - Use QR Code

9/6/2018
Recipe and Photos by: Akala Lemus


Salad Ingredients:

1/2 medium zucchini, chopped into small squares
2 sticks celery, chopped
1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, quartered
1/2 cup pickle, chopped into small squares
2 cups Conchiglie (shell) noodles, cooked
4 cups fresh spinach, loosely packed

 
Dressing Ingredients:

1/2 can garbanzos
1/2 cup veganaise
2 Tbsp Dijon
1 Tbsp coconut aminos
2 Tbsp nutritional yeast
juice from 1/2 lemon
1 tsp Nature's Seasoning
1/2 tsp Salad Sprinkle
1/4 tsp salt, and pepper to taste


Method:

1. Cook noodles.


2. Prep all ingredients for salad.


3. Add all ingredients for dressing into a food processor and blend until well combined and smooth. You may need to push mixture down from the sides of the food processor dish occasionally to make sure everything is blended evenly.


4. Add dressing to salad ingredients (minus the spinach) and mix until well combined. 


5. Put spinach in the bottom of a serving bowl. Add ‘tuna’ salad on top of the spinach, and enjoy!
